other_tests.findings: Low lung volumes; no overt evidence for pneumonia, CHF, large effusion or pneumothorax; likely presence of basilar atelectasis.
GB wall thickening to 4.2mm, multiple gallstones, CBD 4mm.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT scan of abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Distended tip of appendix up to 12mm without fat stranding; distended gallbladder containing multiple stones with subtle fat stranding.
